metadata.title: I can’t find the necessary setup in E2Studio to configure a test project for the MC ASSP

sections.content:
Question:
I can’t find the necessary setup in E2Studio to configure a test project for the MC ASSP.
Answer:
This ASSP is different from the other general-purpose microcontrollers from Renesas, as it is delivered with a pre-programmed motor control application included. Therefore, there is no development needed on end user side.
Suitable Products
RISC-V ASSP
